Title: Meeres Stille
Writer: Stefan Beuse (story), Juliane Fezer (script), Juliane Fezer
Actors: Charlotte Munck, Christoph Grunert, Christoph Gawenda, Nadja Bobyleva
Plot: On vacation at a remote house by the sea a family is faced with a disturbing reality, when lost memories urge to the surface and slowly fades out, what seemed safe once - as well as the past can't be washed away.
